CustomField.description: If and how this product is tracked when sold to customers. Serialized products are tracked by unique serial numbers. Lot/Batch tracked items are identified by the batch or lot numbers. Non-tracked items do not have a lot or serial number.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If and how this product is tracked when sold to customers. Serialized products are tracked by unique serial numbers. Lot/Batch tracked items are identified by the batch or lot numbers. Non-tracked items do not have a lot or serial number.
CustomField.label: Tracking
